data.title: Rwenzori Mountains National Park
data.text: Rwenzori Mountains National Park is a Ugandan national park and UNESCO World Heritage Site located in the Rwenzori Mountains Almost in size the park has Africa s third highest mountain peak and many waterfalls lakes and glaciers The park is known for its beautiful plant life History Rwenzori Mountains National Park was established in 1991 It was designated a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1994 because of its outstanding natural beauty Rebel militias occupied the Rwenzori Mountains from 1997 to June 2001 The park was inscribed on UNESCO s List of World Heritage in Danger between 1999 and 2004 because of insecurity and a lack of resources in the park
